note.p: Daughter of Louis François de Chaumont and his wife Helen McDowell. Sister of Francis Stephen Bennet François de Chaumont.
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/1217/66/7)
Census returns of Scotland 1851 (The National Archives of Scotland: Edinburgh St George 19/20/14)
Scotland old parish registers births 685/1 600 180 Edinburgh (Scotlandspeople.gov.uk, accessed 5 June 2020)
